markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rat Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=5666) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=676" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 31 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat. You gain the effects of a 1st-rank [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1626) spell, but you must assume the battle form of a Tiny rat.
name: Rat Form
